text: The Alabama Vipers were an American football team in the Arena Football League that played in 2010. The team played in the Von Braun Center in Huntsville, Alabama. The team started as to the Tennessee Valley Vipers from 2000 until 2009. They then played as the Vipers. After that, in 2011, the team moved to Gwinnett County, Georgia and became the Georgia Force. == References == Category:Arena Football League Vipers Category:2000 establishments in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in Alabama
title: Alabama Vipers
